headline: Jim Cramer on Chevron (CVX) – “Like Oil? Then Chevron’s a Terrific Place to Be with That 4.8% Yield”
summary: We recently published a list of 13 Stocks on Jim Cramer’s Radar Recently. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Chevron Corporation (NYSE:CVX) stands against other stocks on Jim Cramer’s radar recently. On Monday’s episode of Mad Money, Jim Cramer broke down the day’s market rally and argued in favor […]

headline: Petrobras Q1 Earnings Slump on Flat Production, Price Drop
summary: PBR had a net debt of $56,034 million at the end of the first quarter, up from $43,646 million a year ago and $52,240 million as of Dec. 31, 2024.
